medical_history.chief_complaint: Failure to thrive and electrolyte imbalances.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Failure to thrive was noticed at 4 months of age. The infant had hyponatremia (127 mmol/liter) and hyperkalemia (5.8 mmol/liter) upon admission after presenting with a weight of 3910 g.
medical_history.family_history: Identical mutation of the mineralocorticoid receptor gene found in the patient's father, who was clinically asymptomatic.
